title: Eclipse Leona
body: A cool fan-made skin I found on the internet for Leona. Thought it was very cool and it would deserve being introduced in LoL.

replies.body: If you like this, please upvote it so maybe it can be observed by some Riot staff.
No need, I drew this ;)

Actually when I joined the skins team I'd just tell people 'I'm the dark-Leona guy' and they'd go 'Oh cool I remember that!'. Given that my job is to concept ideas for new skins it's not unlikely that Leona will get a dark skin like this in the future. RiotPenguin and I have a clandestine mandate: "An evil skin for every champion". I know talking about it kind of foils the secret nature Archer-style, but how often does LeBlanc mention The Black Rose?

New favorite Rioter.
Riot Penguin is the true evil mastermind, I am merely his faithful Igor.
Don't that mean you have to give all the evil champs good skins?  Like a peacenik swain or something?
We discussed that, briefly, before deciding that was something someone else would be better suited at. I worked on the concept for Arclight Vel'koz though so it does happen from time to time.
Ah, so you guys have a style that makes it kind of difficult to do that?

Each artist on the team definitely brings their own style: Zeronis is the master of lovely ladies, Riot Penguin covers all things evil and fur-collared, The Bravo Ray has done every Battlecast concept etc. but we also try to push each other out of our comfort zones because sometimes the best ideas come from unlikely places and we want to work on balancing out our bias to ensure every project meets the best result.

Having said that every concept, and then production all the way down to the final in-game product, is ultimately the collaborative work of the whole team. Although we try to ensure that whoever is most passionate about a theme or a champion takes the helm because if we aren't excited about our work how can we expect players to be?

It was a joke about not trusting myself: I'm literally the person I would need to tell about this, and I drew it!
Oh, really? So, new Leona skin confirmed? lol
So besides "I wanted to draw evil Leona", what inspired you to go with this design? Like the ridges and sword?

It was a response to this post by the great Ironstylus: http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3154662&page=14

I used the visual hook of a solar eclipse as a basis while the armour came from two main design elements: rings and 3 repeated plates of armour. I was playing some Demon Souls at the time >:D

If I did this concept today it would be very different (hopefully better), it came out of a sketch on my lunch break at the warehouse I was working at and was never meant as more than a starting point.

I thought about the 'eclipse' representing a dark reality that has broken her trust in the Iron Solari. Her helm covers her eyes as the black truth shades her from the once blinding light of her faith. I like broken heroes and fallen characters because it represents the journey of learning. We all look back on our past and feel stupid for being so naive - it's very relate-able.
